title: For many, a recession will expose harsh truths
text:
It may be time to find out who has been swimming naked, as the Sage of Omaha would have it. Warren Buffett’s line about the effect of a recession on business is worth remembering as we barrel into what looks likely to be a rocky final quarter.

In the case of WeWork, it has not so much been swimming naked, as nude sunbathing on the public beach.

The fundamental flaws in its business (it is impossible to corner the market in property, no matter how big a loss you are willing to sustain) and thinness of its claim on software-like economics (it’s a property reseller and it’s no accident that only one proper Silicon Valley technology venture capital firm is invested) have long been obvious to anyone...
